ai-thag5.3:1.1_0: The sky rains down, like a beautiful song;
ai-thag5.3:1.2_0: My little hut is roofed and pleasant, sheltered from the wind.
ai-thag5.3:1.3_0: I meditate there, free of feces:
ai-thag5.3:1.4_0: so rain, sky, if you wish,

ai-thag5.3:2.3_0: I meditate there, my mind at peace:
